text: Harlequins are a rugby club based in London, England who play in the Aviva Premiership. They are perhaps most well known for their distinctive multi- coloured shirts. The official colours are listed as: light blue, magenta, chocolate, French grey, light green and black. Their ground is not far from Twickenham Stadium (The home of the RFU) which was also the venue where they became Aviva Premiership champions in 2012. ==League position== Season League Position 2010/11 Aviva Premiership 7th 2011/12 Aviva Premiership Champions 2012/13 Aviva Premiership 3rd ===Former position=== Category:English rugby union teams Category:1866 establishments in the United Kingdom Category:Sport in London Category:1860s establishments in England
title: Harlequin F.C.
